channel.title: Blue Shift Otis Model?
channel.description:
So I found this video: [youtube.com/watch?v=HRrudqwLAP8](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HRrudqwLAP8)
I've been looking for this specific Blue Shift Otis model for a very long time. Anyone know where I can find it?
I know that the ORIGINAL version of the model was made by Ambient Impact for Half-Life Opposing Force; but I'm looking for Blue Shift specifically.
